Speaker: LD
Sentence: Se kòm sa nou te (...) nouzòt, m <VERB>ole</VERB> di vou.

Speaker: LD
Sentence: Chnal, se la lve, vou frape leu Fleuv la lve an en kote e lòt kote la Rivyè se Rougon e Glin, vou <VERB>konpran</VERB>?

Speaker: LD
Sentence: Mo momon te kònen di mo, 'Ga, rès dan pl--- aou to <VERB>rès</VERB>,' li di, 'To konnen, to kouri---' men wi men--- ... en moun <VERB>ka</VERB> aprann.

Speaker: LD
Sentence: Mo p ole gen en plas si li p ole mo la, vou <VERB>konpran</VERB>?
